message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product!  It's worth a lot to me, so I'm asking for $11,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little further. How about $10,500?  That's a fair compromise, and it allows us both to get a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $9,500?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal possible, and I'm willing to work with you. But $9,500 is just a bit too low for me.  How about $10,250? This is a fair compromise, and it brings us closer to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $9,750?
